entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
